description: Lexicographic ordering of MxMxMxM, where M={0,1,2,...}.
mathematica: lexicographicLattice[{dim_,maxHeight_}]:= Flatten[Array[Sort@Flatten[(Permutations[#1]&)/@IntegerPartitions[#1+dim-1,{dim}],1]&,maxHeight],1]; Flatten@lexicographicLattice[{4,4}]-1(* by Peter Moses, Feb 10 2011 *)
